Description: Stamp (vessel): mikyala. Measure of indigo. Seven lines of an nine line Kufic inscription visible. Nearly half missing at top and left. Made of green glass.
Curator's comments: From the same die: Petrie, W.M.F. 1926. ‘Glass stamps and weights’. London, 121.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (109)
Condition: Nearly half missing at top and left.
Associated names: Named in inscription: Yazīd b. Abī Yazīd
